Package platform.game

Base package of the game's engine.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Linkable
    This interface is used to link an Actor to its corresponding Signals in the Level Building.
    World
    Represents an environment populated by actors.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Actor
    Base class of all simulated actors, attached to a world.
    Arrow
    Arrow represents an Actor dealing ARROW type damages.
    Eraser
    Can erase existing Actors, e.g. in the level Builder.
    Overlay
    Overlay prompts specific informations about the Player, also adds the possibility to change the gravity through SelectGravity
    Simulator
    Basic implementation of world, managing a complete collection of actors.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Damage
    Designate certain types of Damages

Package platform.game Description

Base package of the game's engine. Contains all other classes. Root classes are the most global ones, needing a maximum of permissions in other high-level classes.
